alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 15 at 3:56PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory remains in effect... * Trade winds up to 35 mph with higher gusts are expected to continue to impact the islands... * TIMING...through tonight * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 356 AOAULI ASO FARAILE IULAI 15 2022 ...O loo faaauau le FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI.. * E agi le tuaoloa ma malosi atu pe a agi fa`ata`uta`u, ma o le a aafia ai pea le atunu`u... * TAIMI...seia oo i le Po Nanei. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E pau`u ai laau lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o loo aafia ai le atunuu. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
